hero.title: Join Mōchirīī
hero.intro: Mōchirīī is a quiet, active home for people who enjoy a relaxed community, simple coordination & friendly chat. Join at your pace, learn skills & mechanics with support & settle into events when you feel ready.

steps.title: The Joining Path
intro: These steps get you from arrival to your first smooth run. Leaders handle the setup. Members handle the pace.

items.title: Enter the Hall
items.description: Join the Discord & let a Mod know so we can give you the correct roles, greet you & get you oriented. FYI, you will not be able to see most of the server until verified & after that you won't be able to see the WWM guild section without the proper role. DM a mod or ask in game.

items.title: Read the Codex & Ranks
items.description: Skim the Codex & Ranks pages so you know our tone, basic etiquette & how support works.

items.title: Share your IGN & time zone
items.description: Post your in-game name & time zone so we can get you set up. Remember this is a global server.

items.title: Receive your starting rank
items.description: A leader assigns your starting rank & points you to the right channels, roles & weekly priorities.

items.title: Join an event
items.description: Pick an upcoming event, RSVP & show up. Ask questions early & you will get answers as soon as we are able.

quickStart.title: Quick Start
body: Join Discord & post your IGN + time zone.
RSVP to one event this week, even a small one. Presence builds familiarity fast.

culture.title: Expectations & Culture
intro: Mōchirīī stays comfortable through courtesy, consistent effort & clear communication. Skill grows over time. Conduct shows up immediately.

cards.title: Respect & kindness
cards.description: Keep chat clean, assume good intent & treat every member as someone you may run with for a long time.

cards.title: Activity rhythm
cards.description: Participation stays flexible. Consistent presence over time matters more than marathon sessions.

cards.title: Helping new members
cards.description: Questions belong here. Veterans share tips, builds & mechanics with patience. Leaders step in when guidance helps.

cards.title: Events & updates
cards.description: Events & announcements live in Discord as well as our website, with pinned notes for clarity. RSVP early & follow any posted requirements.

notes.title: Notes
body: Voice chat & even Discord itself is always optional unless an event post says otherwise.
If you feel lost, tag a leader. Getting unstuck fast keeps the game fun.
